channel.title: Gemini on Nan Xiao | 肖楠
channel.description: Recent content in Gemini on Nan Xiao | 肖楠

item.title: Intellectual Minimalism
item.description: Over the weekend, I gave this site a new look. The Hugo theme has been migrated from Bootstrap to Tailwind CSS, but honestly, the framework change was the least interesting part. The interesting part was the excuse it gave me to rethink what a personal site should feel like in the age of intelligence abundance. A wall with dried flowers and a straw hat. Photo by Olivie Strauss. What do I want the site to feel like?
